laws.name: Sales Tax
laws.description: A percentage-based tax applied to all goods transactions. Tax revenue goes to the demesne treasury.

tax_rate.name: Tax Rate
tax_rate.description: Percentage of transaction value taken as tax

laws.name: Demesne Inheritance
laws.description: When a person dies, their stockpile is added to the demesne's stockpile. This ensures all unclaimed goods return to the demesne.
